invitation.subject: Group Invitation

You can now begin to work collaboratively with the group members and read, edit any pad within this group.

Click here to get started: <url>

registration.msg:
Hello,

Your registration was successful! To complete your registration please click on the following link: 

<url>

resetpw.subject: Password reset
resetpw.msg:
Hello,

A password request has been started for your email address.

If it wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email.

If you requested the reset, please visit following link: 

<url>

 to change the password.

the administrator has set a new password for you.
